advanced.title: WARNING: Advanced Algorithm Settings
advanced.description:
WARNING: Proceed with caution

These settings control how the shopping suggestions are calculated. Modifying these values incorrectly may break the suggestion feature.

We recommend leaving these at their default values unless you fully understand how the algorithm works.

The algorithm weights must sum to exactly 1.0 or the feature will not work.

data.consumption_weight: How much to consider usage patterns (0.0-1.0)
data.frequency_weight: How much to consider purchase history (0.0-1.0)
data.seasonal_weight: How much to consider seasonal trends (0.0-1.0)
